section.heading: Transfer of equipment, etc., of Community Center and Playgrounds Department.
section.text: All equipment, machinery, supplies, and materials of the Community Center and Playgrounds Department shall, on the effective date of this chapter, be transferred to the Board.

annoGroup.heading: References in Text
annoGroup.annotation: The words “effective date of this chapter”, appearing in this section, mean 30 days from the date of its approval.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Recreation Board abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 10-201.
